SPIGA_OFFER_DETAILS: Oh no! Our Pizza delivery to the moon got lost in space! Help us collecting the pizza slices, so we can still deliver the order and in return we will suprise you with new goodies every day.
EMIL_OFFER_DETAILS: Help! Our Andiamo Delivery order to the moon got lost in space! Collect as many bowls as possible and as a thank you we will give a great prize for the highest high score of the day! So it pays off to participate every day! We count on your help!
ANDIAMO_OFFER_DETAILS: Help! Our Andiamo Delivery order to the moon got lost in space! Collect as many bowls as possible and as a thank you we will give a great prize for the highest high score of the day! So it pays off to participate every day! We count on your help!
SV_RESTAURANT_OFFER_DETAILS: Let the games begin! Every week we unlock a new game and you have 1 week to win the weekly prize! Among the top 20 high scorers of the week, we will then draw the weekly prize! So stay tuned!
